channel.title: Vowpal Wabbit on MLWhiz
channel.description: Recent content in Vowpal Wabbit on MLWhiz

item.title: Exploring Vowpal Wabbit with the Avazu Clickthrough Prediction Challenge
item.description: In online advertising, click-through rate (CTR) is a very important metric for evaluating ad performance. As a result, click prediction systems are essential and widely used for sponsored search and real-time bidding. For this competition, we have provided 11 days worth of Avazu data to build and test prediction models. Can you find a strategy that beats standard classification algorithms? The winning models from this competition will be released under an open-source license.
